definition: to strip to the waist/to be bare to the waist
to bare
old variant of 袒[tan3]
shoulder/upper arm

bones and ashes/remains (after Buddhist cremation)

to call (at sb's home) personally
to take sides with/to be partial to/to be biased/to favor one side
following the model/according to precedent

Dharma (the teachings of the Buddha, archaic)/Buddhist doctrine

to walk with mincing steps

sage Emperors Shun and Yao rule every day (idiom); all for the best in the best of all possible worlds
